          <title>
            <string language="en">Energy transformation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Energietransformation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Transformation d'énergie</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Transformação da energia</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Trasformazione di energia</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ενεργειακός μετασχηματισμός</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Transformación de la energía</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This flow chart illustrates the process of transforming energy from chemical to thermal energy by burning fuels.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">burning</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">chemical energy</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">energy transfer</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">energy transformation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">flow chart</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">fuel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">thermal</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Flußdiagramm veranschaulicht den Prozeß 
des Umwandelns von von Energie von der Chemikalie zur thermischen 
Energie, indem es Kraftstoffe brennt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cet organigramme illustre le processus de 
transformer l'énergie du produit chimique à l'énergie thermique en 
brûlant des carburants.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta carta de fluxo ilustra o processo de 
transformar a energia do produto químico à energia térmica 
queimando combustíveis.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo diagramma di flusso illustra il processo 
di trasformazione dell'energia proveniente dal prodotto chimico ad 
energia termica bruciando i combustibili.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα ροής επεξηγεί τη διαδικασία την 
ενέργεια από χημική σε θερμική ενέργεια με το κάψιμο των 
καυσίμων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este organigrama ilustra el proceso de transformar
energía del producto químico a la energía termal quemándose los 
combustibles.</string>
          </description>
